subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Caron Butler made a 19-foot jumper with 0.5 of a second left, capping the Wizards’ comeback from a 21-point deficit in a 92-91 victory against the Magic.
snippet: Caron Butler made a 19-foot jumper with 0.5 of a second left, capping the Wizards’ comeback from a 21-point deficit in a 92-91 victory against the Magic.
